// client/src/components/CreateEvent.js
import React,{useState}from'react';import api from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CreateEvent(){const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',date:'',time:'',location:'',createdBy:''});const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await api.post('/events/create',formData);alert('Event created successfully!');setFormData({name:'',date:'',time:'',location:'',createdBy:''});}catch(error){console.error('Error creating event:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Create New Event"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",value:formData.name,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Event Name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",name:"date",value:formData.date,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"time",name:"time",value:formData.time,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"location",value:formData.location,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Location",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"createdBy",value:formData.createdBy,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Created By",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Create Event"})]})]});}export default CreateEvent;
